title: RCRA - cradle-to-grave control of hazardous waste

content.question: Which of the following laws gave the EPA the authority to control hazardous waste from “cradle-to-grave”, including the generation, transportation, treatment, storage, and disposal of hazardous waste?

choices.label: Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act (CERCLA)

skill.text: Skill 7.B: Describe potential responses or approaches to environmental problems.
